column4: hey guys, is there a problem with flash-nonfree? my firefox constantly turns black and unresponsive and its very very slow when displaying any sort of flash
anything i can do to fix this, or is this a known problem
thats normaly in the extras package
what do yu mean
ubuntu restricted extras
that comes with flash and java
sorry i'm not understanding
I installed flash-nonfree, and you are saying that i should not have because it is a restricted extra
it comes in the extra package set installing it alone is a bit dated
ah, so i should uninstall and then install ubuntu-extras
what is the exact package name?
ubuntu-restricted-extras yep
that will also install java
ok, i don't seem to see how this is any different than just installing it on its own, why is that dated?
i'm cool with java, but i just wanted to know why the other way, with just one package is outdated, it should be the same
acully the set downloads it from flash directly and configurs it for ubuntu
ok, cool
tbroc non-free is a older deb package
bummer that it isn't maintained
ok right when i installed it it took away my battery icon on my laptop
